h1: How Many Calories in 1 Spoon of Sugar?
assumptions: Assuming 1 teaspoon (tsp) of granulated white sugar, ~4 g; a tablespoon would be ~12 g and 48 kcal.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by sugar type, granularity, and measurement accuracy; check packaging for specifics.

quick_answer.text: One teaspoon of granulated sugar provides about 16 kcal, all from carbs.

faqs.q: How many calories in 1 spoon of sugar?
faqs.a: About 16 kcal for 1 teaspoon of granulated sugar.
Yes, 100% carbohydrates, with 4 g sugars per teaspoon and no protein or fat.

faqs.q: How does brown sugar compare to white?
faqs.a: Similar calories (~16 kcal per tsp), but brown has trace fiber and minerals.
